Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_release_3D_sample_handle

The function AIL_release_3D_sample_handle releases a 3D sample handle back to its M3D provider.

void AIL_release_3D_sample_handle(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
is the sample to release back to its provider.

Discussion

If you simply want to play another 3D sound, then you don't have to release the handle and then re-allocate it. Simply call AIL_set_3D_sample_file on the existing sample handle.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle, AIL_set_3D_sample_file
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, void
